channel.title: Comments on: Issue 037 Author Interview: Jasmine Smith and “Into the Flames”
channel.description: Stellar Short Fiction by Women-Identified Writers Since 2010

item.title: By: James smith
item.dc:creator: James smith
item.description: What an informative and exciting interview. The author is so intriguing and what an awesome ability to create a marvelous work. I’m proud to be her father
item.content:encoded: What an informative and exciting interview. The author is so intriguing and what an awesome ability to create a marvelous work. I’m proud to be her father
